title: Updating League being a pain.
body: The last 2 updates or so, its made it to the end where it says applying patches, and it just sits there for ages, and 20 min later still nothing, so close it down, start it back up, and it does this thing called "calculating differences X Files Scanned" and it pretty much has to go threw all the files again and it takes for ever, and what im wondering is, am i just not waiting long enough for the patches?, or is it glitched?, and ideas?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should let the patching process run until completion, if a patch exits unexpectedly (Ie; you closing it before completion) then on next launch it will have to scan for corrupted files. (Which can take a long time)
